products.name: Chocolate Cookies
products.description: Indulge in our rich and decadent chocolate cookies, made with a perfect blend of all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, and creamy chocolate chips. Each bite offers a delightful combination of soft, chewy texture and intense chocolate flavor, making them a favorite for chocolate lovers.

products.name: Brownie Cookies
products.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our brownie cookiesâ€”crispy on the outside and fudgy on the inside. Crafted with premium cocoa powder and a mix of granulated and brown sugars, these cookies deliver a deep chocolate flavor reminiscent of your favorite brownies, with the convenience of a cookie format.

products.name: Nut Cookies
products.description: Enjoy the delightful crunch of our nut cookies, featuring a blend of all-purpose flour and your choice of chopped nuts like walnuts or almonds. These cookies are lightly sweetened with granulated and brown sugars, offering a perfect balance of flavors and textures that make them an irresistible snack.
